mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tbl_cart (cartNo, memberId, goodsNo, cartCount) VALUES (seq_cart.nextval, #{memberId}, #{goodsNo}, #{cartCount})
mapper.select: SELECT g.goodsNo, goodsName, goodsPrice, goodsImage, cartNo, memberId, cartCount FROM tbl_goods g LEFT JOIN tbl_cart c ON g.goodsNo = c.goodsNo WHERE memberId = #{memberId}
